ComicInfo.Summary: PILOT SEASON RETURNS! TAKE CONTROL! Marcus Walsh was an elite Special Forces soldier involved in black ops all over the world. Wet work like this takes its toll and Marcus wanted out, but this wasn't a job you quit. There was only one way out. Now believed dead and completely anonymous, Walsh struggles to use his black ops skills to atone for his past sins. Screenwriter ALAN McELROY (SPAWN, Tekken) and artist TBD (Credits) delivers a hard-hitting adventure of redemption and conspiracy!
